title: Fix About Us founder photo rendering and add founder bio

requirements.summary: Replace the About Us founder image with the provided uploaded photo, center-cropped to 300x400, and ensure it loads from the required static path at runtime.
acceptanceCriteria: On the About Us page, the founder image renders normally (not a blank box / question mark) and displays the user-uploaded photo.

The image is available as a static file at `frontend/public/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` and is requested by the browser at `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` without 404.
The image is cropped/resized to exactly 300x400 (3:4) and looks center-cropped (no extreme off-center cut).

file_operations.description: Replace the existing static asset with the user-uploaded photo `c6a6dcf8-f14a-4450-8eef-9d5f3a00cb79.jpg`, processed into an exact 300x400px (3:4) center-cropped portrait so it reliably serves at `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` (no broken/blank image).

Ensure the founder image in the About Us founder section references the required static URL `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` and keeps appropriate `object-cover object-center` styling so the new 3:4 portrait displays correctly at runtime (no path issues/blank placeholder).

requirements.summary: Add the provided short founder bio text under the founder role/title on the About Us page with consistent styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The About Us founder section displays the provided bio text below the founder role/title, with readable spacing and styling consistent with the page.
All user-facing bio text is in English.

file_operations.description: Add the bio text exactly as provided beneath the founder role/title in the founder section, using existing typography/spacing conventions so it reads well and remains consistent with the page styling.
